mapper.select: select tp.pr_no, tp.pr_brand, tp.pr_name, tp.pr_price, tp.pr_create_dt, tp.pr_modify_dt, tp.pr_status, tp.prc_no, tp.se_no, tpf.prf_uuid as thumbnail, tpc.prc_name as category from tbl_product tp left join tbl_product_file tpf on tp.pr_no = tpf.pr_no left join tbl_product_category tpc on tp.prc_no = tpc.prc_no where tp.pr_status = true and tp.pr_no = #{prNo} order by tpf.prf_status desc limit 1;

select * from tbl_product where pr_status = true and se_no = #{seNo}
order by pr_no desc limit #{productPageSearchRequestDTO.skip}, #{productPageSearchRequestDTO.size}
select count(*) from tbl_product where pr_status = true
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (pr_brand, pr_name, pr_price, prc_no, se_no, pr_create_dt, pr_status) values(#{prBrand}, #{prName}, #{prPrice}, #{prcNo}, #{seNo}, #{prCreateDt}, #{prStatus})
mapper.update:
update tbl_product
pr_modify_dt = #{prModifyDt},
pr_brand = #{prBrand},
pr_name = #{prName},
pr_price = #{prPrice},
prc_no = #{prcNo},
pr_status = #{prStatus},
where pr_no = #{prNo}
UPDATE tbl_product SET pr_status = false WHERE pr_no = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_sell_product (sp_size, sp_status, pr_no, sp_create_dt) values(#{spSize}, #{spStatus}, #{prNo}, #{spCreateDt})
mapper.update:
update tbl_sell_product
sp_modify_dt = #{spModifyDt},
sp_size = #{spSize},
sp_status = #{spStatus},
where sp_no = #{spNo}
UPDATE tbl_sell_product SET sp_status = 'INACTIVE' WHERE pr_no = #{id}
